name: define
description: Gets the definition of a word and posts it in chat.

args.description: Read out the definition to the voice channel you are connected to, if any.
Translates the definitions to a different language.
The language to translate the definitions to. This can be a 2-digit language code or the name of a language.

name: translate
description: Translate a message to another language.

args.description: The language to translate to. This can be a 2-digit language code or the name of a language.
The message to translate. This can be a word or a phrase.

name: settings
description: Change the bot's settings. Settings can be set for the entire server, or for individual channels. Channel settings take priority over server (guild) settings.

sub_commands.name: set
sub_commands.description: Change the value of a setting.

sub_commands.name: remove
sub_commands.description: Remove/reset a setting. If "scope" is "guild" then the setting is reset to the default. If "scope" is "channel" then the setting is removed and the guild setting will apply.

name: help
description: Shows you a list of available commands and how to use them.

args.description: The name of a command to show detailed info about it.
